meanings.definition: A fee or percentage charged by a bookmaker on bets
meanings.sent1: The vigorish the bookie takes ensures they make money regardless of who wins the bet.
meanings.sent2: I placed a bet on the game, but the vigorish reduced my potential winnings.
meanings.sent3: The bookie joked that the vigorish was his favorite part of the job.
meanings.sent4: The vigorish acted like a silent partner, always taking a cut of the winnings.
meanings.sent5: The vigorish loomed over the bet, a reminder of the cost of taking a chance.
